Name: GraFi Halloween
About the game: GraFi Halloween - casual, colorful, minimalist, physical puzzle with traps, treadmills, portals, Jack-O'-Lantern's, Spider's and changing gravity. Player goal is to relocate blue coin, using only the change of gravity, on the blue rock and keep for some time to pass the level. In GraFi Halloween: - Traps - Changing gravity - Cool Soundtrack - Achievements - Halloween art - Treadmills - Portal's - Spider's - Jack-O'-Lantern's - 50 levels
